data.title: Water temperature in Zagreb today
data.meta_description: Water temperature forecast and historical data for Zagreb. Today's weather forecast and surface temperature report. Average monthly temperature
data.text:
This data the coastal Zagreb water temperature today, tomorrow and the upcoming days. Besides, you can also get information about the weather and surf forecast, as well as the data on sunrise / sunset and moonrise / moonset at a given point on any given day.

Current water temperature in Zagreb

Water temperature in Zagreb today is 26°C. Based on our historical data over a period of ten years, the warmest water in this day in Zagreb was, like today, 26°C, and the coldest was recorded in 2021 at 18°C. Water temperature in Zagreb is expected to drop to 20.2°C in the next 10 days. August average water temperature in Zagreb is 23.5°C, the minimum temperature is 18°C, and the maximum is 28°C.

The swimming season in Zagreb lasts from June to August. During those months, Zagreb water temperature does not drop below 20°C and therefore suitable for comfortable swimming. The average water temperature in Zagreb in winter reaches 4.4°C, in spring 11.5°C, in summer the average temperature rises to 22.6°C, and in autumn it is 14.2°C.

Zagreb water temperature by month

These figures shows the average, minimum and maximum monthly water temperature in Zagreb. In addition to the table values, the graph below displays of changes average surface temperature during the year. Values are calculated based on the data over the past 10 years. Using them, you can check the water temperature in Zagreb on any day of this period that interests you. Click on the month link and you will see a table for each day, or alternatively you can view the temperature curve of the month and select 2 different years you want to compare, either in a table or as a curve
